title: Evaluation of artificial intelligence-powered screening for sexually transmitted infections-related skin lesions using clinical images and metadata
details: NN Soe, Z Yu, PM Latt, D Lee, JJ Ong, Z Ge, CK Fairley… - BMC medicine, 2024
abstract: Abstract Background Sexually transmitted infections (STIs) pose a significant global public health challenge. Early diagnosis and treatment reduce STI transmission, but rely on recognising symptoms and care-seeking behaviour of the individual. Digital …

title: Clinical Accuracy of Skin Cancer Diagnosis: Investigation of Keratinocyte Carcinoma Mismatch Rates
details: M Niazi, RH Hope, L Hope - Clinical Dermatology and Surgery, 2024
abstract: Accurate clinical diagnosis of skin cancer allows for timely treatment, however, distinguishing between keratinocyte carcinoma (KC) subtypes based solely on clinical examination is challenging due to overlapping features. This study aims to …
